name: forcepoint-dlp
label: Forcepoint DLP
description: Forcepoint DLP used to prevent data leakage, ensure regulatory compliance, protect intellectual property, manage employee productivity, mitigate risks, and respond to security incidents within organizations.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.placeholder: Server IP Address or Sever Name
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Forcepoint dlp server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Forcepoint dlp server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.tooltip: Username used to access the Forcepoint DLP server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Username used to access the Forcepoint DLP server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.tooltip: Password used to access the Forcepoint DLP server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Password used to access the Forcepoint DLP server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Protocol
fields.name: protocol
fields.tooltip: Protocol that will be used to communicate with the Forcepoint DLP server. Choose either http and https.By default, this is set to https.
fields.description: Protocol that will be used to communicate with the Forcepoint DLP server. Choose either http and https.By default, this is set to https.

fields.title: Port
fields.name: port
fields.tooltip: Port number used for connecting to the Forcepoint DLP server.Defaults to 9443 for the https protocol.
fields.description: Port number used for connecting to the Forcepoint DLP server.Defaults to 9443 for the https protocol.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specify whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select option 'INCIDENTS' or 'DISCOVERY'.
parameters.description: Select option 'INCIDENTS' or 'DISCOVERY'.

parameters.title: IDs
parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Specify the ids comma separated value that you want to retrieve from Forecpoint DLP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ids comma separated value that you want to retrieve from Forecpoint DLP.

parameters.description: Specify 'from date' to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.

parameters.title: To Date

parameters.tooltip: Specify 'to date' to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.
parameters.description: Specify 'to date' to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.

operations.title: Update Incident Status By Incident ID And Partition Index
operations.description: Update Incident Status By Incident ID And Partition Index.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select option 'INCIDENTS' or 'DISCOVERY'.

INCIDENTS.title: Incident IDs
INCIDENTS.name: incident_id
INCIDENTS.tooltip: Specify array of the Incident IDs comma separated to be updated.
INCIDENTS.description: Specify array of the Incident IDs comma separated to be updated.

INCIDENTS.title: Partition Index
INCIDENTS.name: partition_index
INCIDENTS.tooltip: Specify 'partition index' to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.
INCIDENTS.description: Partition Index from the incidents table that are required to build a query. If this field is not provided on an INCIDENTS request, then the system should look up this parameter internally. In this case, the API will require more resources to complete the update action.

DISCOVERY.title: Incident IDs
DISCOVERY.name: incident_id
DISCOVERY.tooltip: Specify array of the Incident IDs comma separated to be updated.
DISCOVERY.description: Specify array of the Incident IDs comma separated to be updated.

parameters.description: Specify 'action type' to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.

STATUS.description: Specify value to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.

Custom Status.description: Specify value to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.

ADD_COMMENT.description: Specify value to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.
ADD_COMMENT.tooltip: Specify value to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.

FALSE_POSITIVE.title: Value

FALSE_POSITIVE.description: Specify value to fetch data from Forcepoint DLP server.
